 Set Up: .FitniumUserGuide.ApiTest.SetUp (edit)
com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture
Could not find fixture: com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture.

Set up the browser and connect to selenium

The server is located at
Could not find fixture: TheServerIsLocatedAt.		 localhost
The server is on port 4444
Using the browser *chrome start at http://localhost:8090/fitnium/
check is selenium initialised true
set speed to 100 milliseconds
set timeout to 20000 milliseconds
write to debug starting test

Lets first start at the Fitnium home page at Magnetic Reason

starting at URL
Could not find fixture: StartingAtURL.		 testpage4api.html

wait for page to load for
Could not find fixture: WaitForPageToLoadFor.		 5 seconds

check
Could not find fixture: check.		 title of current page Magnetic Reason
check text of element xpath=//h1 Fitnium Test Page

check
Could not find fixture: check.		 is Text Present This page contains all the elements neccassary to test Fitnium true

comment
Could not find fixture: comment.
These commands tell the browser how to start
They are commented out because we've already called them above in the Setup Fixture
Using the browser browser start at URL
In addition there are a number of short cut methods for starting a specific browser
using firefox start at URL
using explorer start at URL
using explorer in HTA mode start at URL
using chrome start at URL
And to close the browser
close the browser

Run through browser buttons

click the back button
Could not find fixture: ClickTheBackButton.
click the refresh button
click the close button

comment
Could not find fixture: comment.
You can control what the browsers writes to its console
set browser log level debug info warn error off
